body_html:
I'm not sure I understand. What's the unconnected node you see?

When you just compute, on an interactive session tf.gradients on your final loss and your parameters, do you get 0 or None?

Also, if you're seeing an error you should share the whole stack trace as that's much easier to debug. The shape error you linked looks like it's a real shape error in your code.

body:
I'm not sure I understand. What's the unconnected node you see?

When you just compute, on an interactive session tf.gradients on your final loss and your parameters, do you get 0 or None?

Also, if you're seeing an error you should share the whole stack trace as that's much easier to debug. The shape error you linked looks like it's a real shape error in your code.
